subject: Muslims and Islam
Murders and Attempted Murders
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sam Khalifa, a shortstop for the Pirates in the ’80s, waited more than two decades for justice in the murder of his father, Rashad, who was stabbed to death at his Tucson mosque.
snippet: Sam Khalifa, a shortstop for the Pirates in the ’80s, waited more than two decades for justice in the murder of his father, Rashad, who was stabbed to death at his Tucson mosque.
